name: Spellbooks TCG Mwah
author: _Cuhfs
notes:
Hit it in 79 wins. day one an two i deranked hit plat 3, 3 times, hit plat 4 3 times. I was stuck (with books but i had only 2 secret an 1 life) i built gems an got the rest of the core, then  i went from plat to legend lost like 3 in plat after that
then i hit legend yesterday lost twice an hit kog today. The MVPS, easily tricky, an grass. But if you have a brain you can clap almost any meta deck heroes, got clapped after i stopped missplaying. amazons were hard but i only played them like twice. Have fun to everyone else trying for kog.
